body: As discussed [here](https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/15002#discussion_r445932280), and now that the database class is used to read/write both the install database as well as the buildcache index, we should clean up how the database class uses InstallRecord (maybe creating a class hierarchy to include buildcache records as well as install records).
title: Refactor: Database class as used for install or buildcache
